activities: Valiance Partners, Inc. ("Valiance") offers data migration products and services for its business customers, some of which may be located in the EU/EEA and Switzerland.  Valiance's data migration products are installed on the customer's network.  As such, the customer's data -- which may include personal information -- will typically not be transferred to Valiance's servers in the US.  In limited circumstances, though, where product support or troubleshooting is required, the customer may need to transfer its data to Valiance's servers.  In addition, Valiance may collect and process personal data from its EU/EEA/Swiss customers and potential customers through its website.  This personal data is stored on Valiance's US servers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: We will use JAMS as the independent recourse mechanism.
